Description:
Collect pertinent data from the configuration files

Author: Austin Clark
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Cisco Collect Data
Query: sourcetype='cisco-aaa' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%show running-config%' or log like '%show startup-config%' or log like '%show archive config%' or log like '%more%')
